name: A Diplomatic Exchange
description:
Pauline is a human diplomat assigned to the space-faring vessel, USS Plaiedes, tasked with creating diplomacy between organics and androids through a conversation with Juno, an android diplomat aboard the ESS Robotica, the first all-android StarShip. 

CW: This game uses androids' struggles as a metaphor for neurodivergent struggles. As a neurodivergent person, I found this hard to write so it may be hard to play for some people. 

Features in line with O2A2 ~ Queer Edition 2023:

  • Under 1000 words
  • 1 sprite with facial expressions
  • 1 background
  • 1 backing track 
  • 3 endings 
  • UI may be updated during the game jam's duration

Credits: 

Art, programming, music, writing, etc: SemiSinful/Maya Harry
